subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Brandon Jennings will pursue a professional career in Europe, backing out on his commitment to Arizona. Jennings, who played his final two high school seasons for Oak Hill Academy in Virginia, had not yet become academically eligible at Arizona. He had been awaiting the results of a third entrance exam, but decided instead to give up his scholarship, his lawyer said.
